name: hadrot
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))

stmt.origin: bitri(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0), whad(w1, w0, w2))
stmt.pretty: bitri(hadd(w0, w1, w2), hadd(w1, w2, w0), hadd(w1, w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
-| wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w0, w2))
-| wb(whad(w1, w0, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hadd(w0, w1, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))
⊣ (hadd(w0, w1, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w0, w2))
⊣ (hadd(w1, w0, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
-| wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w0, w2))
-| wb(whad(w1, w0, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (hadd(w0, w1, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))
⊣ (hadd(w0, w1, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w0, w2))
⊣ (hadd(w1, w0, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))

body.origin: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
-| wb(whad(w1, w0, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (hadd(w0, w1, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))
⊣ (hadd(w1, w0, w2)↔ hadd(w1, w2, w0))

body.origin: |- wb(whad(w1, w0, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), whad(w1, w2, w0))

comment: Rotation law for the adder sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
